title: My Disciple Wants to Tease Me Every Day - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Shoujo Ai   Xianxia
tags: Age Progression   Ancient Times   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Clingy Lover   Cultivation   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   Heartwarming   Interdimensional Travel   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic Beasts   Master-Disciple Relationship   Pets   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Yandere   Younger Love Interests
author: Jiang Ru   姜茹
description:
The number one beauty of the cultivation world is Di Jiufeng. Her enchanting beauty can drive any living thing crazy.

One day, Fairy* Jiufeng had a change of heart, becoming aloof and no longer partaking in mortal affairs. No one knew why.

But the legendary Fairy Jiufeng did not have a change of heart, she was kidnapped by the fraudulent transmigration system.

Transmigration System: Main Quest – The ancient witch, Deep Darkness, has reincarnated. Avert the apocalypse or die.

In order to survive, Di Jiufeng had no choice but to bring home and raise the ancient witch. She suffered bitter hardships in order to reform the demon. A pity, she didn’t know where things went wrong, but her disciple not only refuse to set revenge aside, but even wants to tease her every day!

Ning Guang (Reincarnated Ancient Witch): Be mine or I’ll destroy the world.

Fairy Jiufeng: …… (terrified). Ah! St… stop! Where are you touching!?

*A really, really pretty/beautiful girl/lady>
